channel.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering on your opinions of what are the best released SP mods for HL2 out there that are expansions of the universe and HL gameplay?
I've already played a lot, so I was just wondering on what I may have missed out on, or things that don't look like they are worth a download, etc. (Mods with HL1 monsters are always nice too :slight_smile: )
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Isn’t Paranoia HL1, though?

I played an HL2 version, but I forgot where I found it…

Read full topic

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
MDIGN:

It’s possiburu, Duke Nukem is a prime example too much hype and release date push backs caused a slur of immature game reviewers to give bad ratings. I actually enjoyed it though.

I would normally disagree, but then I’d have to face the wrath of Kamina.

What I will say, though, is that although DNF was enjoyable (albeit mildly), it felt too little like a Duke game and more like a game from 2002, when people tried to be storytellers but didn’t have a story yet.

Back on topic, Paranoia is an awesome mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

How do you know the unreleased ones will be the best? For all we know, we’ve been fapping for years over a mod that is going to be horribad.

(I hope that BM isn’t bad, but it is still a possibility)

It’s possiburu, Duke Nukem is a prime example too much hype and release date push backs caused a slur of immature game reviewers to give bad ratings. I actually enjoyed it though.

Read full topic

item.description:

Released : Minerva,Human Error,Nightmare House 2.

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
There are more bugs, but the patch fixes everything.

When I first played Minerva, I didn’t know they were bugs xD I just thought it happened to look weird… silly me, I enjoyed it anyway. Fortunately, when running properly, Minerva looks brilliant ^^

Read full topic

item.description:
No, it let me off in the usual spot, it’s just the water :fffuuu:
There are supposedly more bugs, but I didn’t bother getting past the surface of the island, figured there would be more and it would be best to do something about it before going deeper.

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
There are so many of these threads now.

MINERVA: Metastasis is still one of the best. Also worthy of note:

Mission Improbable
Research and Development
Joutomaa Redux
Mistake of Pythagoras (if you like really bizarre and abstract mods that are still awesome)
Dangerous World
Human Error (it’s good, though it has a distinct homebrewed feel)
Offshore (really long with good moments)
Rock 24 (I don’t like it, but a lot of people seem to)
Union
Eye of the Storm (another one I personally don’t care for, but which is wildly popular)
Dear Esther (playitnowplayitnowplayitnowPLAYITNOWPLAYITNOW)

EDIT: have this.

NUTHER EDIT: If you don’t enjoy being face-raped by mods, I would avoid anything by Leon/SPYmaps (Leon’s Map Pack 1, Coastline to Atmosphere, Strider Mountain, Final Project Diary) and think twice about anything by Chris Fox, particularly the Day 11/12/13/14 whatever numbers they are.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
Krazor:

It was okay, but the ally dude was fucking obnoxious.

I wll agree to that.

An interesting one was Half-Life 2: Calamity. It just completely cut out Half-Life and took Gordon straight into City 17…huh.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Single Player HL2 mods?
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Power_Dust:

Yeah, “Research & Development” is a very god mod, but I also recommend “Dangerous World” and soon “Dangerous World 2”. Good level design, story fits well with Half-Life 2 and episodes, all in all a very good mod!

Wouldn’t recommend Dangerous World since their last update, still broken and now with crappy weapon skins!. >

Mod’s I’d recommend:

Half-Life 2: Mission Improbable (Part 2 of 3 released)
Human Error
MINERVA: Metastasis
Random Quest
Reaseach and Development

Read full topic
